articles.title: North Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration Meets
articles.content:
North Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration Meets
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- A general meeting of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration was held here on Tuesday.
					 The meeting discussed an issue of opening a landmark phase for independent reunification this year.
					
					 Kim Ryong Song, chairman of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, in his report said that leader Kim Jong Il's history of his leadership for national reunification was a glorious revolutionary history recorded with immortal exploits, adding that the north and the south could greet a new era of independent reunification thanks to north-south summits and the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 He referred to the fact that the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' moves to escalate the confrontation threw a stumbling block in the way of national reunification, adding that it is the firm stand of the DPRK to finally settle accounts with it which rubbed salt into the wounds of the compatriots struck with grief over the great loss to the nation and staged saber-rattling against them.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 An appeal to all the Koreans at home and abroad was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 The appeal said:
					
					 All fellow countrymen at home and abroad should unite close under the banner of patriotism irrespective of ideology, political view and religion and make a clean sweep of the anti-reunification forces.
					
					 Whoever values the future of oneself and one's family and is concerned about the destiny and future of the Korean nation should come out in a struggle for averting a war and defending peace.
					
					 The North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration proposes compatriots in the north and the south and abroad to meet and open common reunification events of the nation with splendor on the occasions of the 12th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration and the 5th anniversary of the publication of the Oct. 4 declaration to promote reconciliation and unity of the nation and bring about a decisive turn in accomplishing the cause of national reunification this significant year.
					
					 It also proposes holding reunification gatherings and conducting more brisk solidarity activities among organizations of people of various strata and those in various fields in the north and the south this year.
					
					 The above-said committee ardently calls once again upon all the fellow countrymen at home and abroad to unite close under the banner of the north-south joint declaration and more dynamically turn out in the national reunification movement, bearing deep in mind the patriotic mission they have assumed before the era and the nation and thus make a breakthrough towards independent reunification this year without fail.
					
					 Present there were Honorary Co-Chairpersons of the committee Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Ro Tu Chol, vice-premier, Kim Yong Dae, chairman of the C.C., the Korean Social Democratic Party, and Ryu Mi Yong, chairwoman of the C.C., the Chondoist Chongu Party, the chairman, vice-chairpersons and members of the committee, members of its various sub-committees, members of the North Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Pan-national Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification and officials concerned.

articles.title: Koreans in North Vow to Make Every Possible Effort for National Reunification
articles.content:
Koreans in North Vow to Make Every Possible Effort for National Reunification
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The North Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration met here on Tuesday, adopting an appeal to all the Koreans at home and abroad.
					 KCNA had an interview with officials of the committee who participated in the meeting.
					
					 Question: I think the appeal reflects the invariable desire of all the Koreans to achieve the reunification of Korea in an independent and peaceful way and in the principle of great national unity.
					
					 Yun Tok Su: That's right. Korea was divided into two parts by foreign forces and the Koreans have suffered from more than five decades of the division.
					
					 The truth the Koreans acquired in the history of the struggle for national reunification is that national independence is vital to defending the fellow countrymen and making Korea prosperous. 
					
					 Firm is the will of the Koreans to solve the issue of the country's reunification independently by themselves.
					
					 Pak Song Il: What the Koreans are ardently longing for is national reunification. But the bellicose forces at home and abroad are driving the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war in disregard of the desire of the Koreans to live harmoniously in a peaceful reunified country.
					
					 The present situation clearly shows who the main obstacle to ensuring peace on the peninsula is.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north, the south and abroad will invigorate the nationwide struggle to drive the U.S. imperialist forces out of south Korea and resolutely punish the present south Korean puppet regime, antagonistic to the nation and reunification, so as to realize their desire for the reunification.
					
					 Pak Yong Hui: The appeal calls for putting the interests common to the nation above anything else.
					
					 The Korean nation that has lived in the same territory with the same language and same blood is inseparable from each other.
					
					 How can the difference in ideology, ideal, political views and religious belief be put above patriotism in the effort for the reunification?
					
					 The people in the north, together with fellow countrymen in the south and abroad, will make every possible effort to achieve great unity and independent reunification of the nation.
					
					 The interviewers expressed full support to a proposal made by the north side committee to hold this year grand pro-reunification events involving Koreans in the north, the south and abroad and pro-reunification meetings of people of different social strata and organizations in the north and the south to mark the 12th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration and the 5th anniversary of the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Working People's Organizations Meet
articles.content:
Working People's Organizations Meet
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The 64th Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea and the 62nd Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea were separately held here Tuesday.
					 Present there were members and alternate members of the Central Committees and officials of the unions in Pyongyang and other parts of the country.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence for leader Kim Jong Il in the humblest reverence.
					
					 They discussed thoroughly implementing the militant tasks laid down in the decision of the Political Bureau of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee, the joint calls of the Central Committee and Central Military Commission of the WPK and the joint New Year editorial.

articles.title: Implementation of Last Instructions for National Reunification Called for
articles.content:
Implementation of Last Instructions for National Reunification Called for
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- All Koreans in the north, the south and abroad should wage a dynamic struggle for implementing the last instructions of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il for national reunification under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un and thus make a breakthrough towards independent reunification this year without fail.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 To implement the three principles of national reunification and the Oct. 4 declaration precisely means national reunification.
					
					 The three principles laid down by Kim Il Sung serve as the most reasonable common reunification charter of the nation as they indicate a fundamental stand and basic ways for settling the issue of national reunification by the concerted efforts of the nation in line with the will and interests of the Korean nation.
					
					 It was thanks to the above-said three principles that the Korean nation could steadily intensify the patriotic struggle for the reunification of the country, united close as one under the banner of national independence despite the blatant challenges of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad.
					
					 The Oct. 4 declaration is another milestone of the era of independent reunification Kim Jong Il provided to the fellow countrymen as a programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 It is beyond doubt that the June 15 joint declaration will be thoroughly implemented and the gate of independent reunification, peace and prosperity flung open when the Oct. 4 declaration is sincerely implemented.
					
					 Whoever supports the Oct. 4 declaration and opts for implementing it is a patriot but whoever goes against it is a traitor.

articles.title: Socialist Emulation Called for
articles.content:
Socialist Emulation Called for 
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- A meeting of young people of Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill took place on Jan. 31 to make the flames of Hamnam flare up more fiercely in order to challenge all the organizations of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and young people in the field of light industry across the country to a socialist emulation to further contribute to the improving of the people's living standard.
					 The reporter and speakers referred to the fact that the mill's young vanguard have turned out in a drive to glorify the year of 2012 as a year of proud victory when an era of prosperity is unfolding, cherishing the great honor that their mill is going by the august name of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese war hero.
					
					 They called on the members of the youth league to play the role of vanguard and shock brigade in the drive for improving the people's living standard, loudly singing the song of "The Korean Youth March" under the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present there were Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of the Central Committee of the youth league, and officials concerned and officials of the youth league and its members.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work Marked
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- A seminar took place at the People's Palace of Culture Tuesday to mark the 40th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's work "On the Main Tasks of the Union of Agricultural Working People."
					 The work, published on February 16, Juche 61 (1972), sets it as the main task of the union to thoroughly implement the theses on the socialist rural question.
					
					 The participants heard papers proving the validity and vitality of the ideas and theories contained in the work.
					
					 The triumphant accomplishment of Juche cause is possible only when the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea accelerates the three revolutions in rural areas as clarified in the theses, educates and rallies the farmers in the idea of the Workers' Party of Korea and puts the overall rural construction on a socialist basis.
					
					 The speakers said that the publication of the work helped the union carry out the programme for rural construction in every aspect with a proper orientation and ways.
					
					 They called on the agricultural workers to fulfill their mission as reliable defender and supporter of the Party and thus make a tangible contribution to the cause of building a thriving nation. 
					
					 Attending the seminar were Ri Yong Su, department director of the C.C., the WPK, officials concerned and officials of the union in Pyongyang and all provinces, cities and counties.

articles.title: New Poster Produced
articles.content:
New Poster Produced
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House produced a poster "Forward for general offensive in response to Party's call!"
					 The poster depicts the serviceman and people all out in the general offensive against the background of Songun Chollima flying high in response to the flames of Hamnam.
					
					 The poster which reflects the militant call of the party with appealing stroke ardently calls upon all the servicepersons and people to bring about great renovations and leap forward in all fields for the building of a thriving nation to honor the pledge made before the bier of general secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: New Year's Concert of Unhasu Orchestra Given in Huichon
articles.content:
New Year's Concert of Unhasu Orchestra Given in Huichon
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- A concert for the New Year of 2012 "The Cause of the Sun Will Be Immortal" was performed by the Unhasu Orchestra in Huichon of Jagang Province from Jan. 25 to 31.
					 It was appreciated by service members of the People's Army and builders of the Huichon Power Station and people from all walks of life in the province.
					
					 The audience observed a moment's silence in the memory of leader Kim Jong Il in humblest reverence.
					
					 Put on the stage were female trio and chorus "Cantata to Comrade Kim Jong Il", chorus "His Life", male duet and male pangchang "We Long for You, General" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers highly lauded the revolutionary feats Kim Jong Il performed by making indefatigable efforts for the prosperity of the country and the happiness of its people. 
					
					 Narration and orchestral music "DPRK Has Risen Up" and chorus "DPRK, Forward" helped the audience harden their determination to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche that started in Mt. Paektu under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK delegation left to visit China
articles.content:
DPRK delegation left to visit China
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegation of the Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports headed by its Vice-Minister Son Kwang Ho left here Tuesday to visit China.
					 Coming back home on the same day was a delegation of the Ministry of Fisheries led by Minister Pak Thae Won which visited Russia. 
					
					 A delegation of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan led by Vice-Chairman of its Central Standing Committee Pak Ku Ho arrived here Tuesday to visit socialist homeland.

articles.title: Units of S. Hamgyong Province Overfulfill January Plans
articles.content:
Units of S. Hamgyong Province Overfulfill January Plans 
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Officials and workers of various industrial establishments in South Hamgyong Province in the northern part of the DPRK overfulfilled their January plans holding higher the flame kindled by themselves for fresh innovation.
					 The Hamhung Knitting Mill finished the monthly plan 116 percent on Jan. 26 while the Hamhung Disabled Soldiers' Essential Plastic Goods Factory carried out the monthly plan on all indices on Jan. 22.
					
					 Those of mines and industrial establishments in Tanchon area completed January plan 101 percent.
					
					 Coming on top were the Komdok Mining Complex, the Ryongyang Mine, the Paekbawi Mine and the Tanchon Smeltery which radically increased the volumes of ores dressed following their mining and transport.
					
					 The workers of the Ryongsong Machine Complex pushed ahead with the production of custom-built equipment required by several sectors of the national economy.
					
					 The Hamhung Youth Electric Alliances Plant also fulfilled its monthly plan 104 percent.
					
					 Scores of industrial establishments overfulfilled their daily plan. Among them are the Equipment Assembly Complex assigned with the Hungnam gasification project and other major projects including that of the February 8 Vinalon Complex, the Tanchon Mining Industry Construction Complex and the Hamhung Industry Construction Office. 
					
					 The Hamnam Area Coal Mining Complex carried out monthly plan by solving problems by its own efforts.
					
					 The Hamhung Railway Bureau and the Provincial Forestry Management Bureau registered achievements in transport and timber production from early January.
					
					 The Jangjingang and Pujongang power stations raised efficiency of generating equipment to the maximum, ensuring over 105 percent completion of daily plan for electricity generation.

articles.title: Song Adds to Korean People's Yearning for Leader
articles.content:
Song Adds to Korean People's Yearning for Leader
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The song "Ardent Yearning" carried in Rodong Sinmun on Jan. 27 adds to the Korean people's yearning for general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The song truthfully reflects the feelings of the Korean people who had looked forward to meeting the leader in their working places to delight him with their achievements. 
					
					 It also shows their will to remain faithful to the leadership of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, true to the behests of the leader. 
					
					 The Korean people had never thought of the country or their life without the leader as he devoted his all to providing solid foundations for national prosperity and their happiness. 
					
					 The song encourages the army and people to turn out in the effort for building a thriving nation under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: New Strains of Apple, Pear Bred
articles.content:
New Strains of Apple, Pear Bred
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The Pomology Research Institute of the DPRK has bred new strains of apple and pear.
					 Ri Thae Nam, chief of the research institute, told KCNA that they succeeded in acclimatizing high-yielding strains of apple and pear saplings to the climatic and soil conditions of the country after making an analysis of their ecological peculiarities.
					
					 The new strain of apple with sour and delicious taste and sweet smell is 14 percent in sugar content and 0.35 percent in acid content. It is full of juice.
					
					 The apple tree, higher than other strains in productivity, bears fruits one year after planting and tens of tonnes can be harvested in each hectare from after four years. 
					
					 The new strain of pear, full of juice, bears big fruits, each weighing 350- 360 grams and 600 grams to the maximum. 
					
					 The pear is sweet, refreshing and colory. 
					
					 The pear tree begins to bear fruits one year after planting. It bears more fruits than other strains from after three years.
					
					 The new strains of apple and pear will be planted in Kosan, Ryongjon and some other fruit farms from this year.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Vow to Turn Out for Reunification
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Vow to Turn Out for Reunification 
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Civil servants and managing officials of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification called for taking the lead in carrying out leader Kim Jong Il's instructions for national reunification. 
					 They met in Tokyo on Jan. 27. 
					
					 The Association should keep the stand of maintaining national independence and giving priority to the nation, said Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon). He called for foiling the anti-reunification policies of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors and taking the lead in the nationwide reunification movement.
					
					 Ri Tong Je, president of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, said the national reunification was the lifelong wishes of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. It is the most important national historic task assigned to the present generation, he added.
					
					 The drive to carry out Kim Jong Il's behests for national reunification this year is related to the destiny of the nation in the new 100-year history of the Juche era, he said.
					
					 The civil servants and managing officials of the Association will keep to the path of reunification and patriotism holding the dear respected Kim Jong Un as the lodestar of national reunification, he stressed.

articles.title: S. Koreans Slam U.S. Nuclear War Moves
articles.content:
S. Koreans Slam U.S. Nuclear War Moves
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification Sunday made public a commentary hitting at the U.S. nuclear war moves.
					 54 years have passed since the U.S. announced its deployment of nukes in south Korea on Jan. 29, 1958, the commentary said, adding that the introduction of nukes at that time was part of the U.S. strategy to recover its defeat in the Korean War.
					
					 Even before the ink of its signature to the Armistice Agreement (AA) was dried the U.S. had turned south Korea into its logistic base and illegally shipped nukes there while totally denying the conclusion of peace accord and the withdrawal of the U.S. troops, it pointed out.
					
					 The U.S. has since introduced nuclear weapons of various types steadily into south Korea, gravely threatening peace, the commentary charged, and said:
					
					 For the nuclear war crisis to be removed from the Korean Peninsula, it is important to replace the AA with peace accord, drive the U.S. forces out of south Korea and implement the inter-Korean declarations at an early date for peace and prosperity.

articles.title: S. Korean MBC Trade Union Launches General Strike
articles.content:
S. Korean MBC Trade Union Launches General Strike
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The south Korean MBC trade union went into an indefinite general strike on Jan. 30, said the south Korean CBS.
					 The union started the strike for impartial broadcasting, it clarified.
					
					 The union would carry on the strike till MBC Director Kim Jae Chol who is deluged with the scandals of high-handed and arbitrary practices is unseated, it stressed.
					
					 The strike is positively supported by broad south Koreans.
					
					 The Citizens Federation for Democratic Press said the strike will hobble the present regime's four-year-long efforts to put the broadcasting under control, warning if Director Kim refuses to leave office counting on the regime on the decline, the citizens would surely unseat him.
					
					 The media trade union held a press conference to support the strike of the MBC on the same day.

articles.title: Cuba Urges UN Security Council Actions against Israel
articles.content:
Cuba Urges UN Security Council Actions against Israel
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Cuba on Jan. 24 urged the UN Security Council to adopt practical measures so that Israel puts an end to policies that violate international law.
					 This stand of Cuba was expressed by its permanent representative to the UN in an open debate of the UNSC about the situation in the Middle East, including the Palestinian issue.
					
					 He said that contacts between Israelis and Palestinians have not brought a reduction of provocations or any concrete proposal.
					
					 The negotiation process interrupted by Israel's intransigence and its decision to continue building Israeli settlements in occupied Palestinian territories should be resumed, he said.

articles.title: Cuba Denounces U.S. Radio-Electronic Aggression
articles.content:
Cuba Denounces U.S. Radio-Electronic Aggression
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Cuba on Jan. 23 denounced the increase in U.S. radio and television aggression at the World Radiocommunication Conference.
					 The head of regulations and rules at the Cuban Ministry of Informatics and Communications, Wilfredo Lopez, condemned Washington's violation of international law, especially on regulations of the constitution, agreement and rules of radio-communications.
					
					 During his speech at the plenary session of the Conference, Lopez noted that the United States continues to broadcast television programs to Cubans from a plane owned by the U.S. government.
					
					 It is unacceptable that the U.S. government ignores and violates the regulations and commitments reached by the international community, Lopez underlined.

articles.title: U.S. Strategy for Aggression under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Strategy for Aggression under Fire 
						
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The United States worked out a strategy for aggression using Network as a new means of a war and is giving spurs to its implementation.
					 The U.S. recently spelled out "a network operation strategy".
					
					 The above-said strategy calls for introducing preemptive attack in the network operation and describes the preemptive strike within network as "preemptive strike going beyond boundaries."
					
					 In a word, this strategy is aimed at preempting attack on other countries in the field of network in a bid to destroy military intelligence-gathering facilities, etc. and thus maintain a strategic edge and attain its aggressive purpose.
					
					 Pursuant to this strategy, the U.S. seeks to have under its control both network "shield" and "spear" in an effort to defuse the threat from potential enemies and ensure an unchallenged edge.
					
					 The U.S. installed computer virus at the majority of its military bases as a weapon and seeks to build a network "shield" linked with NATO allies.
					
					 In the past the U.S. got nervous about the defense of network in the main but it is now channeling its efforts into network attack forces according to the doctrine of preemptive attack.
					
					 To this end, the U.S. established a network headquarters for network attack operations and put it under a strategic headquarters in a military base in the suburbs of Washington.
					
					 It is said that the U.S. keeps more than 30 000-strong network forces at present.
					
					 It is stepping up the development of new type network operation weapons with an investment of a stupendous amount of fund. It also produced software aimed to spread pro-U.S. information and create confusion among "hostile states" in listening to media.
					
					 It plans to create a unit for network operations at reserve forces.
					
					 The U.S. persistently hatches plots to disarm other countries in the field of network.  
					
					 One of them is "freedom" in internet and it is doggedly forcing other countries to apply it. 
					
					 All facts go to prove that the U.S. is a disturber of world peace and stability as it uses even IT for carrying out its strategy for aggression though it should be used for the prosperity and development common to mankind.

articles.title: Reality of DPRK Introduced by Brazilian Paper
articles.content:
Reality of DPRK Introduced by Brazilian Paper
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Brazilian newspaper Hora do Povo on Jan. 22 carried a travelogue on the DPRK written by Carlos Batista Lopes, first vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, illustrated with photos of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The travelogue titled "Beautiful Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Korea" referred to the revolutionary activities of the President and the leader. It also carried impressions the writer got of Kim Il Sung's birthplace at Mangyongdae, the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, the Tower of the Juche Idea and the International Friendship Exhibition House he visited.
					
					 It recalled that the President founded the Juche idea in the early period of his revolutionary struggle and the leader comprehensively systematized and successfully embodied it.
					
					 Noting that Kim Jong Il pursued the Songun politics in all fields to defend socialism in the period of the most rigorous trial after the demise of Kim Il Sung, the travelogue continued:
					
					 The Songun politics was embodied to not only military affairs but also all fields of the country including economy.
					
					 The economy of the DPRK has maintained self-supporting and socialistic characters and the Korean people have advanced, overcoming every difficulty.
					
					 The DPRK has turned into a full-fledged nuclear weapons state and producer and launcher of satellites.
					
					 The loss of Kim Jong Il was the greatest loss to the Korean people.
					
					 But the Korean people will overcome sorrow with strength and courage and implement his behests.

articles.title: Lao News Agency on Overseas Koreans' Reverence for Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Lao News Agency on Overseas Koreans' Reverence for Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The Lao news agency introduced overseas Koreans' reverence for the dear respected Kim Jong Un on Jan. 17.
					 Recalling that overseas Koreans highly praised General Kim Jong Un as a great man, the news agency conveyed the impressions they got of him when meeting him at the Kumsusan Memorial Palace after the demise of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Un was so modest that they felt warm friendship in him and he was so good-natured, sturdy in his posture and cordial and kind-hearted man that he looked just like President Kim Il Sung the moment they met him, the news agency added.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il to Be Commemorated in India and Pakistan
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il to Be Commemorated in India and Pakistan
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Preparatory committees for commemorating the 70th birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il were formed in India and Pakistan on Jan. 23 and 24.
					 P. Shiv Shankar, chairman of the All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association, and the minister of Social Welfare of the Sind State Government of Pakistan were elected chairmen of the preparatory committees.
					
					 The Indian committee decided to organize a seminar in New Delhi with splendor to mark the Day of the Shining Star and hold various political and cultural events under the sponsorship of political parties, social organizations and organizations for the study of the Juche idea.

articles.title: Work Off Press in Panama
articles.content:
Work Off Press in Panama
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- General secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was brought out in booklet by the Group for Study of the Juche Idea in Panama on January 23.
					 The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun revolutionary line, the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea, is a powerful political mode in the present era which carried forward and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of giving importance to the army and a scientific revolutionary line and political mode that most correctly reflected the requirements of the times and the revolution.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona Unidad 1017 de fuerzas aereas del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona Unidad 1017 de fuerzas aereas del EPC
 Pyongyang, 31 de enero (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Estado y el ejercito, dirigio un entrenamiento de vuelo durante su inspeccion sobre la Unidad 1017 de las fuerzas aereas del EPC que recibio el titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup.
					 El Comandante Supremo fue acogido en el mismo terreno por el general de ejercito del EPC, Ri Pyong Chol, comandante de las Fuerzas Aereas del EPC, y los comandantes de la Unidad.
					
					 Luego de dirigir largo tiempo el entrenamiento de los pilotos en las afueras del puesto de mando donde hacia mucho viento, el dijo que le ha conmovido mucho el ejercicio de esos aviadores fidedignos, valientes e intrepidos.
					
					 Reconocio al Heroe de la RPDC Ho Ryong quien dirigia los vuelos y volvio a elogiar sus valientes acciones en aquel combate en que el derribo a un avion de reconocimiento estrategico de los imperialistas norteamericanos que habia invadido el espacio aereo jurisdiccional de Corea.
					
					 Recorriendo el avion que conserva las huellas de direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el Comandante Supremo evaluo a los militares que lo cuidan bien.
					
					 Tomo una fotografia de recuerdo junto con los militares de la unidad.
					
					  Dio valiosas instrucciones recorriendo los equipos tecnicos de combate e instalaciones militares hechos nuevamente en el curso de modernizacion de los armamentos de la unidad. 
					
					  Aprecio mucho el hecho de que la unidad cumple con responsabilidad su mision sin relajar ni un momento la alta disposicion de combate observando agudamente los pasos de agresion de los enemigos.
					
					  Acto seguido, el Comandante Supremo paso revista a la Casa de Militares de la unidad, el dormitorio, el comedor y las salas de leccion de los aviadores de una subunidad de ella. 
					
					  En la Casa de Militares resalto la necesidad de seguir prestando mucha atencion a la educacion ideo-politica para formar a todos los pilotos y otros militares como los fuertes en la ideologia y conviccion. 
					
					  En el salon de ejercicio de pilotaje miro con atencion a los pilotos ejercitando en el sillin y averiguo los detalles de esta labor preguntandoles como actuarian en determinadas contingencias. 
					
					  Caminando en el campo de entrenamiento a pie, aprecio a los pilotos que estan acostumbrados al entrenamiento pensando siempre en el vuelo. 
					
					  En la cocina el Comandante Supremo dijo a los cocineros que aunque usen las mismas materias primas, hagan los platos de diferentes maneras conforme al apetito de los aviadores. 
					
					  Sentado a la mesa de comer de los pilotos, recordo que el 16 de diciembre del ano pasado, el Dirigente         Kim Jong Il habia dicho que se reuniria en Pyongyang con los pilotos ejemplares en el entrenamiento y les ofreceria una cena. 
					
					  El Comandante Supremo visito ese dia la casa del comandante de la unidad, Ho Ryong. 
					
					  Tras saludar a la esposa del comandante, Kim Jong Sil, recorrio una por una todas las habitaciones de la casa y se retrato junto con el matrimonio. 
					
					  Al salir de la casa en la oscuridad, dijo a la esposa de Ho, quien le deseaba buena salud, que transmitiera a todas las esposas de pilotos la recomienda del Comandante Supremo de atender bien a sus maridos.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama a toda nacion a la lucha por reunificacion de patria
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama a toda nacion a la lucha por reunificacion de patria
 Pyongyang, 31 de enero (ACNC) -- Todos los integrantes de la nacion coreana en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben abrir este ano la brecha de la reunificacion independiente de la patria, al librar bajo la guia del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un la lucha por materializar los legados del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en esa materia. 
					 Senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual de este martes y prosigue: 
					
					 La reunificacion de la patria implica la implementacion de los Tres Principios de la Reunificacion de la Patria y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre. 
					
					 Los Tres Principios presentados por el Presidente son la carta de reunificacion mas justa y comun de la nacion que aclara la posicion fundamental y los remedios para resolver por cuenta propia ese asunto conforme a la voluntad y los intereses de la nacion coreana. 
					
					 Gracias a los Tres Principios, la nacion coreana pudo unirse como un solo hombre sosteniendo en alto la bandera de independencia nacional aun en medio de los brutales desafios de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion dentro y fuera del pais y desarrollar constantemente la lucha patriotica por la reintegracion territorial del pais. 
					
					 La Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, programa de ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, es otro jalon de la era de reunificacion independiente preparado por el Dirigente.
					
					 Es obvio que cuando ella sea implementada con sinceridad, se materializara cabalmente la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y se abriran las puertas de reunificacion independiente, paz y prosperidad. 
					
					 Quien apoya y ejecuta la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre es el patriota, y el opositor a ella es el traidor a la nacion.

articles.title: EE.UU. usa el Network en sus fines de agresion
articles.content:
EE.UU. usa el Network en sus fines de agresion
 Pyongyang, 31 de enero (ACNC) -- Estados Unidos establecio la nueva estrategia de agresion tomando el Network como otro espacio de guerra.
					 Segun la "estrategia de operaciones en el espacio de Network" presentada recientemente por EE.UU., el ataque preventivo en ese espacio "no tendra fronteras".
					
					 En una palabra, EE.UU. pretende alcanzar sus metas de agresion al tomar la superioridad estrategica en Network destruyendo las instalaciones militares de IT de otros paises mediante el ataque preventivo.
					
					 Como parte de sus esfuerzos por procurar el "escudo" y la "lanza" con que pueda aventajarse a sus rivales potenciales en la red de redes, doto con las armas de virus las computadoras de la mayoria de sus bases militares e intenta formar el "escudo" en cooperacion de sus aliados de la OTAN.
					
					 Para fortalecer la "lanza", fundo la comandancia de las operaciones ofensivas de Network en una base militar en los alrededores de Washington y la subordino a la comandancia estrategica.
					
					 Segun trascendidos, sobrepasan 30 mil los efectivos que se dedican a la guerra de Network.
					
					 Por otra parte, EE.UU. acelera el desarrollo de nuevas armas para las operaciones de Network invirtiendo fabulosos fondos y produjo un software que difunde rumores pro-norteamericanos y perturba la transmision de los medios de prensa de los "paises hostiles".
					
					 Se propone fundar hasta en las filas de reservistas la unidad especializada en la operacion de ese tipo.
					
					 Ademas, lanza una persistente campana publicitaria online para desestabilizar a otros paises.
					
					 Por ejemplo, insiste en la "libertad" en Internet y la impone obstinadamente a otros paises.
					
					 Todos los hechos demuestran una vez mas que el perturbador de la paz y estabilidad del mundo es precisamente EE.UU. que abusa hasta de la IT, que debe ser usada en funcion de la prosperidad y desarrollo comunes de la humanidad, en el cumplimiento de las guerras de agresion.

articles.title: Asamblea general del comite norteno por ejecucion de declaracion conjunta
articles.content:
Asamblea general del comite norteno por ejecucion de declaracion conjunta
 Pyongyang, 31 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este martes en esta capital la asamblea general del Comite Norteno por la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, en la cual se abordo el problema de abrir este ano una coyuntura trascendental de la reunificacion independiente de Corea.
					 En su informe, el presidente del citado Comite Norteno, Kim Ryong Song, dijo que la historia de direccion del General Kim Jong Il sobre la reunificacion de la patria es la revolucionaria gloriosa coronada con sus inmarcesibles proezas y subrayo que la cumbre del Norte y el Sur de Corea y la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio permitieron a ambas partes acoger una nueva era de reunificacion independiente.
					
					 Se refirio a que debido a las maniobras conflictivas de la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak, se creo un gran obstaculo ante el camino de reintegracion de la patria y recalco que la posicion rotunda de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea es liquidar hasta el final la cuenta con la banda traidora que apunto el fusil contra los connacionales que se retorcian por el gran duelo nacional e hizo sablazos al corazon de estos.
					
					 Acto seguido, hubo intervenciones.
					
					 En la ocasion fue aprobado el llamamiento dirigido a todos los coreanos del pais y en ultramar.
					
					 El documento subraya:
					
					 Todos los coreanos tienen que unirse con firmeza bajo la bandera de amor por la patria y la nacion por encima de las diferencias de las ideologias, ideales, criterios politicos y creencias religiosas para eliminar a todas las fuerzas anti-reunificacion.
					
					 Quienes aprecian el futuro de si mismos y de sus familias y se preocupan por el destino y el futuro de nuestra nacion deben levantarse en la lucha por prevenir la guerra y preservar la paz.
					
					 Para promover este ano significativo la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion y traer un cambio decisivo en el cumplimiento de la empresa de reunificacion de la patria, el Comite Norteno por la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio propone que los coreanos en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar se reunan en el mismo lugar para celebrar solemnemente los actos conjuntos para la reunificacion de la nacion con motivos del 12o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y del 5o aniversario de la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.
					
					 Ademas propone dinamizar este ano la reunion de reunificacion y las actividades solidarias entre las entidades de diversos estratos y sectores del Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					
					 El Comite Norteno por la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio vuelve a exhortar calurosamente a todos los coreanos del pais y en ultramar a unirse con mas firmeza bajo la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta intercoreana guardando profundamente la mision patriotica asumida ante la epoca y la nacion y a levantarse con mas vigor en el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria, para abrir este ano a toda costa una brecha de la reunificacion independiente.
					
					 En la ocasion participaron los copresidentes honorarios del Comite Norteno por la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio: el vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema Yang Hyong Sop, el vicepremier Ro Tu Chol, el presidente del Comite Central del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea, Kim Yong Dae y la presidenta del CC del Partido Chondoista Chong-U, Ryu Mi Yong; el presidente, vicepresidentes y miembros de dicho comite, los miembros de las subcomisiones, los miembros de las direcciones nortenas de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP) y la Alianza Pannacional de la Juventud y los Estudiantes por la Reunificacion de la Patria (Pomchonghakryon) y otros funcionarios correspondientes.
